rule: If the word can be tagged, the output must not be any of the specified part of speech tags: CC, CD, DT, EX, FW, IN, JJ, JJR, JJS, LS, MD, NN, NNS, NNP, NNPS, PDT, POS, PRP, PRP$, RB, RBR, RBS, RP, SYM, TO, UH, VB, VBD, VBG, VBN, VBP, VBZ, WDT, WP, WP$, WRB.
evaluation:
The output "NN" is one of the part-of-speech tags listed in the description. The task is to return just the part of speech tag for a given word. Since "NN" is a valid tag from the provided list, the output complies with the description requirements.

No violation.
OK
